SELECT * FROM ( SELECT eq.id, eq.title, eq.`type` AS typeId, eq.`time`, eq.`from` , eq.origin , CASE eq.`level` WHEN 1 THEN '简单' WHEN 2 THEN '一般' WHEN 3 THEN '中等' WHEN 4 THEN '较难' WHEN 5 THEN '极难' END AS `levelStr`, eq.`level`, eq.createtype, eq.owner, eq.site , eq.del, eqa.content, eqa.correct, eqa.`options`, eqt.name AS `type` ,epq.score ,epq.sort FROM e_question eq LEFT JOIN e_question_attribute eqa ON eq.contentid = eqa.id
AND eq.del = #{del}
LEFT JOIN e_question_type eqt ON eqt.id = eq.`type` left join e_paper_question epq on epq.question_id = eq.id ) a WHERE 1=1
AND a.id IN ( SELECT euq.question_id FROM e_user_questions euq WHERE euq.user_id = #{userId} )
AND a.id IN ( SELECT epq.question_id FROM e_paper_question epq WHERE epq.paper_id = #{paperId} )
and ( a.content LIKE concat('%',#{key},'%') or a.title LIKE concat('%',#{key},'%') or a.type LIKE concat('%',#{key},'%') )
and a.owner = #{owner}
select euq.question_id from exam.e_user_questions euq where euq.user_id = #{owner}
